paper_abstract: Let C be a cone in R(3) whose base B is a planar convex body in a horizontal plane pi and whose tip is a point upsilon is not an element of pi. Let C be a packing formed by translates of C and -C in R(3). We exhibit an explicit constant c > 0 such that the density of any such C is smaller than 1 - c, answering a question of Wlodek Kuperberg.
paper_title: Packing cones and their negatives in space
